messages.subject: RE: [SHQ] Hey
messages.msgSnippet: Hello Thanks for letting us know about your condition, however, this sort of thing is better discussed off-list, as it has nothning to do with our content.
messages.messageBody:
Hello

Thanks for letting us know about your condition, however, this sort of thing
is better discussed off-list, as it has nothning to do with our content.
Sorry, but rules are rules. I've also noticed you did the same thing for the
Spy Division and the PeaceMaker list-- please refrain in those areas, as
well.

Thanks for understanding.

--M.

messages.subject: Hey
messages.msgSnippet: I m getting better now slowly yet surely I am getting there. Though I still suffer from bouts of coughing to the point of I can t breath, but I m going to get
messages.messageBody:
I'm getting better now slowly yet surely I am getting there. Though I
still suffer from bouts of coughing to the point of I can't breath,
but I'm going to get better.
